channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Private Hedge overgrown footpath, 24th August
item.description:
Private hedge from 1 Parr Close has overgrown half the footpath which makes it harder for pushchairs to get past. Please can you get this cut back

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Parr Close, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street lights, 23rd August
item.description:
None of the street lights in Hartbury close and Ettington close are working and been like this for nearly 4 weeks now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Hartbury Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous Road Surface Pittville Circus Road 3, 23rd August
item.description:
This has been previously reported, recent inspection from the council says thar this is perfectly safe. I would suggest that the inspection revisits and makes a second inspection. This Road surface is dangerous and should not be ignored by the County council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Circus Day Nursery Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous Road Surface Pittville Circus 2, 23rd August
item.description:
This has been previously reported and again has been ignored by the County council. This is a serious hazard to cyclists the negligence of the council could result in a serious or fatal accident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): North Hall Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous Road Surface Pittville Circus 1, 23rd August
item.description:
This dangerous pot holes has been reported previously but has been ignored by the council. It needs urgent attention before a cyclist is hurt or killed due to the County Council negligence

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): North Hall Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole and loose drain cover, 23rd August
item.description:
On the Northbound side of Cleeve road there is a pothole and loose drain cover causing a clanking noise when a vehicle is driven over it. Location as shown on the map (outside of house 'Sunrise')
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 24 Cleeve Road, Gotherington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown foot path, 23rd August
item.description:
The footpath is now completely covered by these trees and brambles. Owners approached however she was incredibly hostile.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 67 Stanwick Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Exposed electrical conductors, 23rd August
item.description:
Electrical meter box with missing door exposing 3 phase (415 volts) service fuses. Has been in this state for some time now, extremely dangerous to anybody within proximity!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Croft Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fire station warning lights out, 23rd August
item.description:
The warning lights out side Churchdown fire station are not working. A engine left with siren & blue lights flashing at 12:37pm today and the warning lights situation each side of the station did not warn drivers the engine was leaving the station.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): National Grid Pylon Zfb 013 Adjoining A40 Layby Cheltenham Road East, Longlevens
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of rubbish all the way through the Lane, 22nd August
item.description:
Im not sure which council would cover Pheasant Lane.GL51 0XX so I thought I would drop you a line about the rubbish in this Lane Over the years I have cycled and walked many times down this Lane and of course at the moment with the ongoing roadworks on the Gloucester Road pedestrians ( or according to the road signs pedestrains) are being advised to use Pheasant lane as the footpath on the Gloucester Road is being worked on. This Lane is being spoiled with loads of rubbish/fly tipping. It would then be a lot better for countryside walkers and cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Ashley Pheasant Lane, Staverton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lamp post knocked over redmarley road, 21st August
item.description:
This lamp post has been left in this state for over 2 years. The safety bag has been there so long it has holes in it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Redmarley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous potholes and poor road surface, 21st August
item.description:
The road is riddled with dangerous potholes and the surface if the road is wearing away. It’s an absolute danger to cyclists and needs urgent attention
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 18 Irving House Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 21st August
item.description:
2 commercial fridges dumped at the northern end of the Honeybourne, near the rear access gates of the PoW Stadium.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Orchard Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedges need cutting along Prestbury Road, 21st August
item.description:
The hedges along the top of Prestbury Road need cutting as the footpaths are getting narrower and narrower. On the side where Prestbury Park is, the footpath is dangerously narrow, and opposite that, when pulling out of Glebe Road, visibility is dangerously poor. Please cut these hedges as soon as possible. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 325 Prestbury Road, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barriers left in place, 20th August
item.description:
Resurfacing work was carried out at the entrance to Cherston Court some weeks ago. Barriers are still in place causing problems entering and leaving the road. There has been no evidence of any work being done for some time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Cherston Court, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cans dog mess and litter dumped at the end of Cowper Road, 20th August
item.description:
Cans dog mess and litter dumped at the end of Cowper Road. Please can somebody clear it up

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Cowper Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lamppost outside 3 Pitman Road has been badly damaged, 20th August
item.description:
Lamppost outside 3 Pitman Road has been badly damaged. Can someone please come and fix it before it falls down

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 46 Shelley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tagging on a telecoms box Chad Road, 19th August
item.description:
